input.sentences: my mom and i traveled to this city about three months ago .
she took a picture of me balancing on an exercise ball .
after we goofed around for a bit | we went to go see this tower .
near the tower | we found an artistic piece as a banner on the fence .
this artistic piece was right next to a hotel and a diner so we went to eat and sleep afterwards .
output.sentences: Mom traveled many months on her job.
As she exercised on the ball she followed the pictures.
She goofed off a bit at the tower.
At the tower she found a piece of the rock.
She slept in the hotel with the found piece.
